entity.name: paper
entity.query: select id, version, cluster, title, abstract, year, venue, venueType, pages, volume, number, publisher, pubAddress, tech, public, ncites, versionName, crawlDate, repositoryID, conversionTrace, selfCites, versionTime from papers
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT id, version, cluster, title, abstract, year, venue, venueType, pages, volume, number, publisher, pubAddress, tech, public, ncites, versionName, crawlDate, repositoryID, conversionTrace, selfCites, versionTime from papers WHERE id='${dih.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT id FROM papers WHERE versionTime > '${dih.last_index_time}'
